entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
